forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. West wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 49. South southwest wind 2 to 6 mph.

weather_report:
This afternoon in Downtown San Francisco unfolds under predominantly sunny skies, with a touch of warmth that dances around the high of sixty-two. The air is brisk, carrying a gentle west wind that whispers through the streets, a refreshing companion as the temperatures ease down to the late afternoon chill of fifty-eight. Despite the sun's presence, a fine layer of clouds hangs lazily in the distance, hinting at evening's imminent embrace. As darkness approaches, expect to see the skies morph into a canvas of soft gray, with temperatures dipping to around forty-nine, accompanied by a light south-southwest breeze that will maintain a subtle chill.

The day is quite pleasant, inviting a variety of leisurely activities. One might choose to stroll along the Embarcadero or wander through Fort Mason, taking in the views of the bay while soaking up the fleeting warm sunlight. As evening approaches, it would be wisest to layer up, perhaps with a light sweater or jacket, to ward off the coolness that settles in. This transition between day and night carries an ineffable charm, imbued with the soft glow of street lamps beginning to flicker to life under the cloudy skies. The marine layer is gentle yet present, framing the horizon with an ethereal touch, whispering of the typical coastal charm that characterizes this beautiful city by the bay.
